org.apache.catalina.connector

类 OutputBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • org.apache.catalina.connector.OutputBuffer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, ByteChunk.ByteOutputChannel, CharChunk.CharOutputChannel

    public class OutputBuffer
extends java.io.Writer
implements ByteChunk.ByteOutputChannel, CharChunk.CharOutputChannel
    The buffer used by Tomcat response. This is a derivative of the Tomcat 3.3 OutputBuffer, with the removal of some of the state handling (which in Coyote is mostly the Processor's responsibility).
    作者:
    Costin Manolache, Remy Maucherat

      • OutputBuffer

        public OutputBuffer()
        Default constructor. Allocate the buffer with the default buffer size.

      • OutputBuffer

        public OutputBuffer(int size)
        Alternate constructor which allows specifying the initial buffer size.
        参数:
        size - Buffer size to use

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Close the output buffer. This tries to calculate the response size if the response has not been committed yet.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.io.Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        指定者:
        close 在类中 java.io.Writer
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - An underlying IOException occurred

        public void realWriteBytes(byte[] buf,
                           int off,
                           int cnt)
                    throws java.io.IOException

        realWriteBytes 在接口中 ByteChunk.ByteOutputChannel

        off - Offset
        cnt - Length
